description:
**Now WebOS 2.0 compatible!
 **Now with Distribution Lists!!  
Make groups to text and email friends and family all at once! Supports Email and Messaging app!!  

**Speed Dial Pro is the ultimate speed dial utility for power users! Speed Dial Pro a FAST, light-weight app that allows you to call and text your important contacts in as little as two taps! Speed Dial Pro offers two separate speed dial lists to allow you to organize your speed dial contacts for easy access! Separating work and personal phone numbers just became easier! Speed Dial Pro also offers Web Quick Links that allow you to quickly access your highest priority websites without fumbling around looking for the Web icon! A quick link button to your Email brings up Inboxes faster than ever! There is also a quick link button to launch the Camera quickly, allowing you to catch that ‘perfect shot’ before the moment is over! Add Speed Dial Pro to your Quick Launch tray for easy access! Don’t need all these fancy features? 
Then try Speed Dial Plus, just as fast, but without the bells and whistles!
